name: BindingCollection
description: Represents the collection of all the binding objects that are part of the workbook.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: count
properties.description: Returns the number of bindings in the collection.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Gets a binding object by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the binding object to be retrieved.

methods.name: getItemAt
methods.description: Gets a binding object based on its position in the items array.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index value of the object to be retrieved. Zero-indexed.
